name: copilot-chat-analyzer
description: TypeScript library for analyzing and monitoring GitHub Copilot chat exports with status detection, request counting, and MCP tool tracking
author: dealenx

ai-usage.purpose: Analyze GitHub Copilot chat exports for dialog status, request counting, and MCP tool monitoring
ai-usage.quick-start: import CopilotChatAnalyzer, { DialogStatus } from 'copilot-chat-analyzer'; const analyzer = new CopilotChatAnalyzer(); const status = analyzer.getDialogStatus(chatData);
main-features: Dialog status detection (pending, in_progress, completed, canceled)

common-methods.getRequestsCount: Returns number of requests in chat
common-methods.getDialogStatusDetails: Returns detailed status information with flags
common-methods.getMcpToolMonitoring: Returns MCP tool usage statistics and monitoring data

status-meanings.pending: Chat created but no requests made yet (requests: [])
status-meanings.in_progress: Chat has requests but not completed
